mapper.insert: INSERT INTO follow(f_cl_id, f_type_id, f_time, f_content, f_u_id) VALUES (#{fClId}, #{fTypeId}, #{fTime}, #{fContent}, #{fUId})
mapper.select: SELECT ft.ft_type AS fType FROM follow f INNER JOIN ftype ft ON f.f_type_id=ft.ft_id WHERE f.f_cl_id = #{clId} GROUP BY ft.ft_type
SELECT f.f_time FROM follow f INNER JOIN ftype ft ON f.f_type_id=ft.ft_id WHERE ft.ft_type = #{ftType} AND f_cl_id = #{clId} ORDER BY f.f_time DESC LIMIT 0,1
SELECT f.*, ft.ft_type AS fType FROM follow f LEFT JOIN ftype ft ON f.f_type_id = ft.ft_id WHERE f.f_cl_id = #{clId} AND ft.ft_type = #{ftType} ORDER BY f.f_time DESC
SELECT * FROM follow WHERE f_cl_id = #{fClId} ORDER BY f_time DESC
